list.name: screenmode
list.title: Screen Mode
list.description: Screen mode. Full screen window is suggested for newer systems

list.name: filtering
list.title: Anisotropic Filtering
list.description: Improves the quality of the ice texture when viewed at an oblique angle

input.name: fov
input.title: FOV Modifier
input.description: Field of view modifier. Effectively zooms the camera.

input.name: cutscenefovmin
input.title: Min Cutscene FOV Modifier
input.description: Sets the minimum FOV modifier for cutscenes

input.name: cutscenefovmax
input.title: Max Cutscene FOV Modifier
input.description: Sets the maximum FOV modifier for cutscenes

list.name: fpsprecision
list.title: FPS Precision
list.description: Low precision uses millisecond timing. High precision uses nanosecond timing (slower).

list.name: fpsupdate
list.title: FPS Update Interval
list.description: The rate at which the FPS display is visually updated.

input.name: lodbias
input.title: LOD Bias
input.description: Sets the LOD bias for mip mapping

boolean.name: wireframe
boolean.title: Wireframe
boolean.description: Draw only the edges of primitives

boolean.name: enableditties
boolean.title: Ditty Engine
boolean.description: Enable or disable the ditty engine script

input.name: penaltytimer
input.title: Penalty Time
input.description: Period time in minutes during penalties. 0 = No Change, Default 20

input.name: ottimer
input.title: OT Time
input.description: Period time in minutes during OT. 0 = No Change, Default 20

input.name: lastmintimer
input.title: Last minute timer
input.description: Last minute time in seconds during third period and OT. 0 = No Change, Default 60

input.name: goalreplays
input.title: Goal Replays
input.description: The amount of times to display a goal replay

boolean.name: instantfights
boolean.title: Instant Fights
boolean.description: Enable the option to fight when two fighters are on the ice

input.name: pointswin
input.title: Points: Win
input.description: Points awarded for winning a game

input.name: pointswinot
input.title: Points: Win OT
input.description: Points awarded for winning a game in OT

input.name: pointsloseot
input.title: Points: Lose OT
input.description: Points awarded for losing a game in OT

input.name: pointstie
input.title: Points - Tie
input.description: Points awarded for a tie game

boolean.name: preciseluatimer
boolean.title: Precise Lua Timer
boolean.description: Increases the precision of timers created in lua scripts

boolean.name: disableautopause
boolean.title: Disable Auto-pause
boolean.description: Stops the game from automatically pausing when the game window loses focus.

list.name: vertexprocessing
list.title: Vertex Processing
list.description: Set the D3D8 vertex processing mode

boolean.name: dumptextures
boolean.title: Dump textures
boolean.description: Dump textures as primitives are rendered (huge performance impact)

boolean.name: dumppixelshaders
boolean.title: Dump pixel shaders
boolean.description: Decompile and dump pixel shaders as primitives are rendered (huge performance impact)

boolean.name: dumpvertexshaders
boolean.title: Dump vertex shaders
boolean.description: Decompile and dump vertex shaders as primitives are rendered (huge performance impact)
